item.title: Convert LaTex to HTML
item.description: Converting the .tex file directly to HTML using the tool 'htlatex' is a better approach. htlatex is powerful and flexible, and it can be used easily on Linux based operating systems.
item.author: muriukikelvin27@gmail.com (Kelvin Muriuki)

item.title: Why LaTex
item.description: This blog attempts to explain what Latex is, in under five minutes.
